## Navigation.inactivityTimeoutMinutes property

Number attribute which sets the inactivity timeout in minutes Control via `inactivity-timeout-minutes`

**Signature:**

```typescript
inactivityTimeoutMinutes: number;
```

## Remarks

Default is 30 minutes
